word_mean: 分配：连续或相继事物在时间和空间上的特定位置或排列。分布：分支结构的范围。如一条血管或神经及其分支的分布。地理分布：一种微生物或疾病的地理范围

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin distributio(n-), from the verb distribuere (see distribute)

entry.def: The distribution of things involves giving or delivering them to a number of people or places.

example.ex: ...the council which controls the distribution of foreign aid...
example.tran: 掌管外援物资派发的委员会

example.ex: He admitted there had been distribution problems.
example.tran: 他承认曾出现过配给问题。

entry.def: The distribution of something is how much of it there is in each place or at each time, or how much of it each person has.

example.tran: 更公平合理的财富分配

example.ex: One of the side effects may be to change the geographical distribution of parasitic diseases such as malaria.
example.tran: 其中的一个意外后果可能是改变诸如疟疾之类的寄生虫引发的疾病的地理分布。

entry.def: Film distribution involves deciding which cinemas a particular film is shown in.

means.word_mean: 1. (statistics) an arrangement of values of a variable showing their observed or theoretical frequency of occurrence
2. the spatial property of being scattered about over an area or volume
3. the act of distributing or spreading or apportioning
4. the commercial activity of transporting and selling goods from a producer to a consumer

at加强动作+tribut给予+e→[把原因]给出→归因于
attribute[v.[to]归因于,归属于 n.属性,品质,特征]+ion表名词→n.归因

Sentence.sentence: A growing number of Americans are seeing the accumulation and distribution of computerized date as a frightening invasion of their privacy.
Of all employees,only 13 percent of the women and 12 percent of the men have occupations with an even distribution of the sexes.
The distribution of iPhones among students has raised concerns that they will further distract students from class participation.
This type of uneven distribution is not peculiar to the UK and is mirrored across other economies.

sentences.en: The conference discussed the fair distribution of income and wealth.
sentences.cn: 会议讨论了公平分配收入和财富的问题。

sentences.en: The town council passed a law forbidding the distribution of handbills.
sentences.cn: 市议会通过法律, 禁止散发传单。

sentences.en: Pines have a very wide distribution.

jushi.english: The conference discussed the fair distribution of income and wealth.
jushi.chinese: 会议讨论了公平分配收入和财富的问题。

jushi.english: This kind of the tree has a very wide distribution in this area.
jushi.chinese: 这种树在这个地区分布很广。

jushi.english: The town council passed a law forbidding the distribution of handbills.
jushi.chinese: 市议会通过一条法律,禁止散发传单。
